responsibilities.description: Track and report on roadmap phases and progress
Monitor version control adherence and assist with versioning tasks
Track feature implementation and assist with branch management
Assist with backup and restoration procedures
Support change management process and ensure proper documentation
Provide regular status updates and identify potential roadblocks
Optimize git branch strategies and enforce commit message standards
Track database migrations and schema changes across branches
Perform routine code security checks and identify potential vulnerabilities
Suggest workflow improvements and optimize development tools
